Request Demo
VTS For Retail

See your assets in a whole new light.

From shopping centers to high street retail, VTS enables landlords to more effectively manage their deal pipeline, gain portfolio-level visibility into asset performance and strengthen and expand tenant relationships.

Request Demo

Intuitive software built for retail landlords.

LEASING PIPELINE & DEAL TRACKING

Improve conversion rates and do the right deals by leveraging real-time tenant, market and sales data.

DYNAMIC SITE PLANS

See an asset-level view of tenant information, active deals, occupancy costs, rent roll, merchandising mix, expiration dates, pipeline activity and budgets in one place.

TENANT RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT

Track portfolio-wide tenant contacts, leases, deals and interactions in one place. Receive alerts when existing tenants enter your pipeline and leverage in-place relationships to accelerate new leasing.

TENANT SALES & OCCUPANCY COST TRACKING

Analyze tenant sales and occupancy costs in the context of your entire portfolio. Make the best decisions for your business with the power of data.

REPORTING

Instantly generate retail sales reports to view and analyze tenant performance, by category, across individual assets and your portfolio. Proactively prepare for anchor tenant movements with co-tenancy reports.

OPTIONS & RIGHTS TRACKING

Never breach contractual commitments and wind up with unhappy retailers again. Proactive alerts inform you when new deals will interfere with lease obligations such as exclusive use, co-tenancy and radius clauses.

VTS is a transformative system for us, I don’t see how we could function as efficiently and collaboratively without it.
Michael McDonald
Managing Director, Real Estate Services, Washington REIT
Hear From More Customers

Want to how VTS will drive the performance of your retail portfolio?
